stem: Given question: After being stuck indoors all day breathing fresh air would lead to what? and answer: feeling refreshed, explain why in
no_more_50_words: Being stuck indoors all day, e.g., at an office, tends to make people feel stuffy. This stuffy feeling can be reduced by going outside for refreshing, fresh air.
100_to_150_words: After being stuck indoors all day breathing fresh air would lead to feeling refreshed because the air inside is usually stale and stagnant. Stale air contains pollutants and allergens that can cause breathing problems and fatigue. Fresh air, on the other hand, contains oxygen and other beneficial elements that can help clear the airways and give a sense of mental clarity. Furthermore, being outdoors, even for a short period of time, can help reduce stress and anxiety, and bring a sense of calm. This can be further enhanced by taking part in activities such as walking, running, or simply enjoying the scenery. All of these factors can contribute to feeling refreshed after spending time outdoors.
